page.title: 13CLADY FARM
page.content:
rope had come off.We went into a field which had a bull and Charolais with their calves.We went into another field with more Charolais cattle.After we saw the cattle we went into a shed. Mr.Simpson has a barrel which contains bulls' semen.It is used for Artificial Insemination.It is stored in liquid Nitrogen. It could last for centuries! Mr.Simpson shows his cattle at Balmoral,Ballymena and Antrim shows. I think he loves his work as a farmer or he would not have shown us round his farm with such enthusiasm.
{ANDREW RUSSELL
